info.title: Payments Gateway API
info.description: Here you will find REST Calls available for get transaction details and payment process status.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

get.description: Returns the best installment options according to the informed params.

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request.  Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

error.message: Value must be greater than Zero

post.description: This request is the first step to create a new transaction.

post.description: The second step to create a new transaction. Here, you have the option to send the data in three diferent ways: doing a private request, a public request or a private request that uses a saved Credit Card.

post.summary: 2.2 Send Payments With Saved Credit Card
post.description: The second step to create a new transaction. Here, you have the option to send the data in three diferent ways: doing a private request, a public request or a private request that uses a saved Credit Card.

post.description: The third step to create a new transaction. It will send the additional related data to the transaction, like billig and shipping adress.

name.description: Type of data that will be added to the transaction.

value.description: Data to be added to the transaction.

post.description: The fouth and last step to create a new transaction. It will authorized the new transction creation acorrdint to the data previously informed in the latests requests.

minicart.description: This field is filled with the content of the cart of the transaction, which can be obtained using [Get Orders](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orders#getorder) or [Transaction Details](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/transaction-process#transactiondetails) endpoints. It should only be included for transactions with split payment.

This field is filled with the content of the cart of the transaction, which can be obtained using [Get Orders](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orders#getorder) or [Transaction Details](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/transaction-process#transactiondetails) endpoints. It should only be included for transactions with split payment.

tags.name: Installments
tags.description: We provided payment methods configuration that allow our sellers to configure installment options and from that configuration we generate an installment service.

tags.name: Transaction Process
tags.description: This is meant to explain the requests that are necessary to complete a transaction using PCI Gateway.

tags.name: Transaction Flow
tags.description: After one transaction is authorized, there is remaining to do some calls in order to complete a transaction and its payments. We explain the settle process, cancel authorized payments process, and refund process by using examples.
